scenarios.name: 1 Successful Login

steps.name: I am on the Demo Login Page
I fill the account information for account StandardUser into the Username field and the Password field
I click the Login Button
I am redirected to the Demo Main Page
I verify the App Logo exists

scenarios.name: 2 Failed Login

steps.name: I am on the Demo Login Page
I fill the account information for account LockedOutUser into the Username field and the Password field
I click the Login Button
I verify the Error Message contains the text "Sorry, this user has been banned. "

scenarios.name: 3 Order a product

steps.name: I am on the inventory page
user sorts products from high price to low price
user adds highest priced product
user clicks on cart
user clicks on checkout
user enters first name Alice
user enters last name Doe
user enters zip code 592
user clicks Continue button
I verify in Checkout overview page if the total amount for the added item is $49.99
user clicks Finish button
Thank You header is shown in Checkout Complete page
